SYSTEM: 03_SPARQL.pdf: Página 41
•  Concatenate property paths, Arbitrary Length paths, 
etc. 
•  E.g. names of people Tim Berners-Lee transitively 
co-authored papers with… 
SELECT DISTINCT ?N   
 WHERE {<http://dblp…/Tim_Berners-Lee>,  
        (^foaf:maker/foaf:maker)+/foaf:name ?N 
       }  
 
49 
Ontological Engineering Group 
Property Path expressions
speaker: SYSTEM
